name: GOG Galaxy
notes: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action and Undertale crash with overlay in-game enabled.

task.app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43 physx
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- galaxy: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/soredake/lutris-additions/master/GOG_Galaxy_2.0.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: /runWithoutUpdating /deelevated
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/GalaxyClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: galaxy
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43 physx
    arch: win64
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    silent: true
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: '1'
    WINEFSYNC: '1'
  reset_desktop: true
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
